attributes.action: Put sanctions against the USA in place until the government has stabilised
attributes.additional_details: The government should impose sanctions on the United States until a time that trump and his administration either stop attacking people’s civil and human rights or the administration finishes their term or is removed from office. The administration is also having a negative impact on international relations and appears to be bringing us ever closer to full blown war. It is our responsibility to stand up for what is right and to take action when necessary. We must not stay silent
attributes.background: Since Donald trump has taken office he and his administration has attacked people’s civil rights. It is clear to many that the level of discrimination, racism, transphobia and homophobia has not been since the 1930’s.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Apply sanctions to the US
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716617
